arts.ttl: Liverpool repeat unwanted Leicester, Chelsea feat in Forest crumbling
arts.sum: Liverpool drop out of the top ten in the Premier League table and have already suffered six defeats after 12 games after losing 3-0 against Nottingham Forest.

arts.ttl: Forest inflict stunning defeat on Liverpool at Anfield
arts.sum: Goals by Murillo, Nicolo Savona and Morgan Gibbs-White condemn Liverpool to their sixth defeat in seven Premier League games as Nottingham Forest put on a brilliant display to win 3-0 at Anfield.

arts.ttl: Liverpool 'nerves' lead to 'very bad' Nottingham Forest defeat, Virgil van Dijk admits
arts.sum: The Reds’ skipper held nothing back in his assessment of another heavy defeat

arts.ttl: Alexander Isak equals unwanted 119-year record in Liverpool's loss to Forest
arts.sum: Alexander Isak equals an unwanted 119-year record as Liverpool lose 3-0 against Nottingham Forest in the Premier League on Saturday at Anfield.

arts.ttl: VAR Review: Murillo goal vs. Liverpool, Igor Jesus handball disallowed
arts.sum: Liverpool conceded a goal against Nottingham Forest that was similar to the one that was denied by VAR for them vs. Manchester City. But why?

arts.ttl: Video: Savona’s goal in Nottingham Forest’s 3-0 win over Liverpool
arts.sum: Italian defender Nicolò Savona scored a goal, his second in the Premier League this season,...

arts.ttl: Liverpool 0-3 Nottingham Forest: Reds slump to sixth defeat in seven Premier League games
arts.sum: The Reds had no answer to Sean Dyche’s well-drilled Forest

arts.ttl: Liverpool 0-3 Nottingham Forest Stats: Reds Fall to New Nadir as Forest Run Riot at Anfield

arts.ttl: Premier League Match Centre issue TWO statements after Liverpool vs Forest controversy
arts.sum: Liverpool players protested after Murillo fired Nottingham Forest in front at Anfield, while VAR then intervened again minutes later to rule out Igor Jesus' goal for the visitors

arts.ttl: Liverpool vs Nottingham Forest LIVE: Premier League match stream, latest team news, lineups, TV, prediction
arts.sum: Reds out to avenge defeat in the corresponding fixture last season
